verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is a love
Deep in the soul
O when you love
O when you love
The veil is torn
Mystery pours
Down from above
Down from above

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And yet we are under benediction
So there is grace

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, we rejoice
What a Savior
What a King
Hallelujah, lift your voice
To our Savior
To our King

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O please do stay
Where you remain
Do not fall
Do not fall
Something greater
Is on the way
Just hang on
Try to hang on
Try to hang on

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
The love of angels
Becomes a love anew
O heavenly light
Takes on a fair skin

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
What a Savior
What a King
